divs: Sighting Details3 red lights appeared to be hovering or travelling at an indiscernable rate. All three lights remained in a constant triangular formation relative to one another for the duration of the sighting. Within about a 5 minute time of observing them, they gradually were obscured from our sight, by barely thick enough clouds, so that when they were no longer visible, no more sightings were seen after (damn the luck of the clouds that night). I am careful about characterizing any sightings in the sky as UFOs as I am a frequent sky watcher, day or night. I am positive that what I saw, and 4 other people also saw, whom I had called their attentions to observe, were 3 red lights that certainly were not airplanes or jets, helicopters or weather balloons.
Summary: 3 non-blinking red lights were visible in the S. Western sky, relative to Mt Tabor area.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around June 21st 2007
